mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERINFO T WHERE T.ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM USERINFO T WHERE T.USER_CODE = #{user_code}
SELECT * FROM USERINFO T WHERE T.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO(USER_CODE, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, STATUS) VALUES(#{user_code}, #{user_name}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERINFO SET PHONE = #{phone} WHERE USER_CODE = #{user_code}
